thread.title: Tyra Beauty, Honest Company Join Brands Distancing Themselves From Trump
thread.title_full: Tyra Beauty, Honest Company Join Brands Distancing Themselves From Trump

title: Tyra Beauty, Honest Company Join Brands Distancing Themselves From Trump
text: Nordstrom Is Dropping Ivanka Trump's Brand A former Celebrity Apprentice sponsor, Tyra Beauty stated to #GrabYourWallet in an email dated 2/7/17 that "We want to make it clear that Tyra Beauty is not an active sponsor of The Celebrity Apprentice series and does not plan to become one in the future." Tyra Beauty was removed from the #GrabYourWallet list the same day this statement was made." Alba's company, The Honest Company, was also removed from the boycott list on Tuesday. Here is the #GrabYourWallet statement regarding that: "A former Celebrity Apprentice sponsor, The Honest Company has committed to not participating in potential future seasons of the show. Note: sponsors / brands appearing in the 2017 season of the show filmed it a full year ago and ad hoc reports from various Celebrity Apprentice sponsors indicate that NBC may have been less than fully transparent with them about Donald Trump's continued involvement, as they were attempting to sever ties with him at the time. NOTE: that is ancectodal / not confirmed and Celeb Apprentice did reportedly sign contracts w/ the show in the fall of 2015, several months after Donald had announced his candidacy, made his infamous remarks equating Mexicans w/ rapists, and had beat the immigration drum on the campaign trail throughout the summer leading up to that period." We're glad #GrabYourWallet dropped Tyra Beauty and The Honest Company from their listsâ€”both companies have some seriously fabulous products that would be hard to give up. Jessica Alba dishes on her five top tips for becoming a beauty mogul: #
